title: [SOLVED]mcp89mz-a2 caps?
message:
Hi, I have a problem with an 820-2879 there was corrosion on a cap and now it is gone and I need to replaced it but I don't know the characteristics.
it doesn't appears anything about it in the schematics.
It is at the bottom of the chip

title: [SOLVED]mcp89mz-a2 caps?
message:
I have no idea but I have a truckload of dead mcp89s sitting under my air filter on the floor you are welcome to, to steal a cap from. msg me your mailing address.

but i doubt that is the problem.
